info.name: Just Run [Game of Thrones Dashboard Theme]
info.description: Game of Thrones dashboard theme featuring Jaime and Cersei Lannister. Purple/warm color scheme.
info.additionalInfo:
Graphics and coding by http://mocking-turtle.tumblr.com

If you find any irregularities, please contact me here or at my tumblr.

----

Update 11/27/11: background should now work on all pages
Update 2/28/12: default post icons should not appear in front of the custom post icons
Update 5/31/12: fixed like icon placement
Update 2/2/13: removed colored like/following icons, due to compatibility issues with recent updates
